recommended_mitigations.title: Enforce signed firmware with verified public keys
recommended_mitigations.description: Ensure each device verifies firmware signatures with a vetted public key and rejects unsigned or invalid updates.

recommended_mitigations.title: Protect debug interfaces
recommended_mitigations.description: Disable or gate JTAG/UART in production; require physical or cryptographic attestation.

recommended_mitigations.title: Rotate hardcoded tokens
recommended_mitigations.description: Remove hardcoded provisioning tokens; issue unique per-device credentials.
